text: hrux wa phwk cea xyu dwy meux khwam tay di yeiym kray yax kub khna thi khea klaw kæ luk «khxng khea wa phwk cea ca khearph sakkara xari hlangcak chan? Phwk khea klaw wa phwk rea ca khearph sakkara phracea khxng than læa phracea hæng brrda bida khxng than khux xi brxhim xis ma xil læa xis hak tæ pheiyng xngkh deiyw læa phwk rea ca pen phu swamiphakdi tx phraxngkh theanan
